name: Sports And Things, Inc.
description: Provider of a social networking web site that allows users to share information with family members. The company enables users to create a private page where family can share photos, share life updates, store contact information and post messages.
one_liner: Provider of a social networking web site that allows users to share information with family members. The company enables users to create a private page where family can share photos, share life updates, store contact information and post messages.
